name: brokeranalysis
description: An AI-driven single-page web application to help traders research, compare, and select forex brokers.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3000 5173,3005" "vite --host localhost --port 3000"
scripts.dev:3000: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --host localhost --port 3005"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fresh: node -e "console.log('Use start-dev-clean.bat or start-dev-clean.ps1 instead')" && exit 1
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.dev.ts --host localhost --port 3005"
scripts.dev:stable: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host localhost --port 3005"
scripts.dev:3001: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3001 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host localhost --port 3001"
scripts.dev:fix: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host localhost --port 3005 --clearScreen false"
scripts.dev:verbose: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --debug hmr --host localhost --port 3005"
scripts.dev:no-hmr: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --host localhost --config vite.config.no-hmr.ts --port 3005"
scripts.dev:no-loop: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --host localhost --config vite.config.no-loop.ts --port 3005"
scripts.dev:3002: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3002 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3002"
scripts.dev:port: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3002 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3002"
scripts.dev:safe: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3003 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3003"
scripts.dev:3003: concurrently "npm run proxy:dev" "npm run redirect -- 3003 5173,3000" "vite --config vite.config.stable.ts --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3003"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run proxy:start" "npm run redirect -- 3005 5173,3000" "vite --host localhost --port 3005"
scripts.build:full: vite build --outDir dist/client && vite build --ssr prerender-entry.tsx --outDir dist/server && node scripts/prerender.js
scripts.proxy:dev: cd api && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.proxy:start: cd api && npm install && npm start
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:components && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:coverage && npm run lighthouse:ci
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.blog:all: npm run blog:sync && npm run dev
